abstract: California Parole Board denies compassionate release for Gregory Powell, serving life sentence in 1963 kidnapping of Los Angeles Police Officers Ian Campbell and Karl Hettinger and fatal shooting of Officer Campbell.
snippet: The State Parole Board denied compassionate release for the man who killed a Los Angeles police officer during a kidnapping that was chronicled in the novel “The Onion Field.”
lead_paragraph: The State Parole Board denied compassionate release for the man who killed a Los Angeles police officer during a kidnapping that was chronicled in the novel “The Onion Field.”

headline.main: California: ‘Onion Field’ Killer Will Not Be Released
headline.print_headline: California: ‘Onion Field’ Killer Will Not Be Released
headline.seo: ‘Onion Field’ Killer Will Not Be Released
